item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国市场现在的动向
高德美将股价定在最高点，推动欧洲 IPO 市场发展
item.description: 护肤品公司 Galderma Group AG 的 23 亿瑞士法郎（26 亿美元）首次公开募股定价高于市场预期，为缓慢反弹的欧洲上市市场带来了急需的信心。【原文：Skincare company Galderma Group AG priced its 2.3 billion Swiss-franc ($2.6 billion) initial public offering at the top of the marketed range giving much needed confidence to a slowly rebounding market for European listings.】

item.title: 宝马认为，即使需求降温，高级电动车仍将推动增长
item.description: 宝马汽车公司（BMW AG）表示，即使全球电动汽车需求降温，其高端电动汽车今年仍将继续推动增长。【原文：BMW AG said its premium electric vehicles will continue to drive growth this year, even as global demand for EVs cools.】

item.title: 迪拜柏金公司首次公开募股（IPO）耗资 4.29 亿美元，首次亮相即大涨 31
item.description: Parkin Co.PJSC 在迪拜首次公开发行 4.29 亿美元的股票，获得了创纪录的需求量，股价跳涨高达 31%。【原文：Parkin Co. PJSC jumped as much as 31% in its Dubai debut after a $429 million initial public offering that received a record amount of demand.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 韩国金融服务管理局敦促银行加大对房地产项目的支持力度
item.description: 韩国金融监督机构敦促贷款机构扩大对陷入困境的建筑商的金融支持，因为人们对陷入困境的房地产项目风险的担忧与日俱增。【原文：South Korea’s financial watchdog urged lenders to expand financial support for troubled builders as concerns grow over risks from distressed real estate projects.】

item.title: 英国收购目标要求更多，尽管溢价为多年来最佳
item.description: 英国公司的讨价还价者发现，英国公司也不是省油的灯，即使是最落魄的公司也要与潜在买家争夺更好的收购溢价。【原文：Bargain hunters on the prowl for British companies are finding that UK Plc is no pushover, with even the most beaten-down companies battling would-be buyers for better takeover price premiums.】

item.title: 鲍威尔和上田的 "鹰 "果然像鸽子一样飞翔
item.description:
美联储和日本央行不想表现得过于强势，但也不希望被 "颠簸 "所左右  

。【原文：

The Federal Reserve and Bank of Japan don’t want to come on too strong, but nor do they wish to be pushed around by ‘bumps’  

】

item.title: 红海已成为充满易受攻击船只的战区
item.description:
面对胡塞武装的袭击，无法追踪保险的老旧船只正在红海航行—而这些船只正在增加对环境和结构破坏的威胁

。【原文：

Older ships with untraceable insurance are navigating the Red Sea in the face of Houthi attacks — and they’re increasing the threat to environmental and structural damage for everyone else

】

item.title: 欧洲支持乌克兰小麦令农民更加愤怒
item.description:
欧洲领导人正努力在国内政治和对基辅的援助之间寻求平衡，因此这种不安对他们来说是一个挑战。【原文：

The disquiet is a challenge for European leaders as they seek to balance domestic politics with aid for Kyiv.

】

item.title: 南非发现公司与美国保险公司洽谈扩张事宜
item.description: 南非最大的医疗保险提供商 Discovery Ltd. 正在与美国同行洽谈将其旗舰健康计划 "活力 "引入美国市场的事宜。【原文：Discovery Ltd., South Africa’s biggest health insurance provider, is in talks with US peers to bring its flagship wellness program known as Vitality to their market.】

item.title: 购物中心业主暹罗皮瓦特考虑进行 2022 年以来泰国最大规模的首次公开募股
item.description: 据知情人士透露，泰国购物中心业主暹罗皮瓦特公司（Siam Piwat Co.【原文：Thai shopping mall owner Siam Piwat Co. is moving closer to what would be the country’s biggest initial public offering in about two years, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 日本储蓄者藏有四万亿日元。具体数额如下
item.description: 随着日本股市在经历了几十年的低迷之后飙升至历史新高，政府现在正试图鼓励散户投资者将他们的十万亿日元现金储蓄投入股市。【原文：As Japanese equities soar to record highs after a decadeslong slump, the government is now trying to encourage retail investors to put their one quadrillion yen in cash savings to work in the stock market.】

item.title: 印度沙普尔吉集团向贷款人寻求高达 24 亿美元的贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Shapoorji Pallonji 集团正在与包括国营电力金融公司在内的贷款机构进行谈判，寻求筹集多达 2,000 亿卢比（约合 24 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Shapoorji Pallonji Group is in talks with lenders including state-run Power Finance Corp., seeking to raise as much as 200 billion rupees ($2.4 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 早期数据强劲，中国人民银行仍有下调存款准备金率的空间
item.description: 中国央行一位副行长表示，中国央行仍有下调银行存款准备金率的空间，并重申有可能采取宽松的货币政策来支持世界第二大经济体。【原文：China’s central bank still sees room to lower the reserve requirement ratio for banks, a deputy governor said, reiterating the potential for looser monetary policy to support the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 上田称日本央行若等待时间过长将面临快速加息风险
item.description: 日本央行行长上田和夫（Kazuo Ueda）表示，日本央行认为，如果在结束该行大规模宽松计划方面等待太久，就有可能不得不迅速加息。【原文：Governor Kazuo Ueda said the Bank of Japan saw the risk of potentially having to raise interest rates rapidly if it waited too long to end the bank’s massive easing program, a view that prompted the board to make that move on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储加息信号提振工业金属，铜重拾涨势
item.description: 随着美联储释放出满足降息预期的信号，风险偏好情绪升温，美元走软，铜价重拾涨势，本周创下 11 个月以来的新高。【原文：Copper resumed its rally that saw it hit an 11-month high this week, with the Federal Reserve’s signals that it will meet rate-cut expectations bolstering risk appetite and weakening the US dollar.】

item.title: 印度大宗商品交易正迈向 14 年来的最佳季度
item.description: 随着印度股市的蓬勃发展，鼓励股东将股权货币化，印度的大宗交易即将创下 14 年来最好的季度业绩。【原文：Block trades in India are close to capping their best quarter in 14 years as the country’s booming stock market encourages shareholders to monetize stakes.】

item.title: 中国建筑商光芒集团在销售下滑之际违约发行美元债券
item.description: 中国开发商光芒控股集团有限公司（Radiance Holdings Group Co.【原文：Chinese developer Radiance Holdings Group Co. defaulted on a $300 million bond after it missed a payment due Wednesday, making it the latest company in the nation’s real estate sector to fail to meet its repayment obligations.】

item.title: 摩根大通考虑在改组中任命新的中国区主管
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根大通公司正在考虑任命其亚太区首席财务官和香港的一位重要交易员来管理其中国业务。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is considering appointing its Asia-Pacific chief financial officer and a key Hong Kong dealmaker to run its China business, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Olam 对澳大利亚棉花加工商 Namoi 的报价高于 Dreyfus 的报价
item.description: 随着全球最大的两家农产品贸易商争相收购澳大利亚最大的棉花加工商，奥兰集团有限公司（Olam Group Ltd.）也加入了对 Namoi 棉花有限公司的争夺。【原文：Olam Group Ltd. has entered the race for Namoi Cotton Ltd. as two of the world’s biggest agricultural traders jostle to buy Australia’s largest processor of the commodity.】

item.title: 基金因财政担忧和免费午餐承诺抛售印尼债券
item.description: 由于选举承诺引发了对预算的担忧和可能出现的支出狂潮，国际投资者对印尼债券变得畏首畏尾。【原文：International investors have become skittish over Indonesian bonds as election pledges have spurred burgeoning budgetary fears and a possible spending spree.】

item.title: 美国为澳大利亚稀土项目提供 6 亿美元贷款
item.description: 一家美国支持的贷款机构向一家澳大利亚矿商提供了 6 亿美元贷款，用于开发一个稀土项目，这是将关键矿产供应链扩展到中国以外地区的最新举措。【原文：A US-backed lender has offered an Australian miner $600 million in loans to develop a rare earths project, the latest move to expand the critical minerals supply chain outside of China.】

item.title: 投资者评估日本和美国利率前景，日元走高
item.description: 由于投资者权衡日本和美国的利率前景，日元八天来首次走强。【原文：The yen strengthened for the first time in eight days as investors weighed the outlook for interest rates in Japan and the US.】

item.title: 日元走软推动出口企业发展，日本股市必将上涨
item.description: 日本央行的政策决定加速了日元的跌势，而美联储的政策决定则让投资者感到宽慰，因此日本股市在公共假期结束重新开市后将会上涨。【原文：Japanese stocks are set to rise when markets reopen from a public holiday after the Bank of Japan’s policy decision accelerated the yen’s drop, while the Federal Reserve provided a sense of relief for investors.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美联储在维持基准稳定的同时，也给了投资者对减产前景的信心。做空机构兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research）有了新目标。美国政府将向英特尔公司提供数十亿美元，用于提高芯片产量。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. The Federal Reserve gave investors confidence in the prospects for cuts even as it held its benchmark steady. Short seller Hindenburg Research has a new target. And the US government is giving Intel billions to boost chip production. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 用数十亿美元铸成大错的投资者又开始小赢一把了
item.description: 麦格理亚洲阿尔法基金（Macquarie Asian Alpha Fund）是该地区量化对冲基金的先驱，高峰期规模达 20 亿美元，在关闭该基金五年后，资深基金经理尼克-伯德（Nick Bird）又回来了。【原文：Five years after shutting down Macquarie Asian Alpha Fund, a pioneer of quantitative hedge funds in the region with $2 billion at its peak, veteran fund manager Nick Bird is back.】

item.title: 贷款配对公司佳音正在与中国四大银行之一洽谈合作事宜
item.description: 中国贷款促进公司佳音集团首席财务官 Charlie Fan 表示，该公司正在与中国一家大型国有银行洽谈合作事宜，以加强其贷款渠道。【原文：Jiayin Group Inc., a Chinese loan facilitator, is in talks with one of the nation’s large state-owned banks for a tie-up as it seeks to strengthen its pipeline, according to Chief Financial Officer Charlie Fan.】

item.title: 石油走高，美国库存减少，美联储降息成焦点
item.description: 在美国库存下降、美联储发出今年将降息的信号后，石油价格攀升，从而提振了更广泛市场的风险偏好，并打击了美元。【原文：Oil climbed after US stockpiles fell, and the Federal Reserve signaled that interest rates would be cut this year, boosting risk appetite across wider markets and bruising the dollar.】

item.title: 交易员从美联储那里获得 "金锁 "前景，推动市场上涨
item.description: 交易员们已经做好了准备，期待杰罗姆-鲍威尔对他们的降息希望作出反击；当他没有这样做时，华尔街上闪现出买入信号。【原文：Traders were prepared for Jerome Powell to push back on their interest-rate-cut hopes — and when he didn’t, buy signals flashed across Wall Street.】
